channel.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2pq9cvt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2rztcet.jpg[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2j0gzz9.jpg[/img] [b] ZodiacsReign was made to assist people who want to create a private server or to help people who need more help with their current server issues, the pack includes ID list's, common tools and a few server sources. ZodiacsReign packs have been around since 2008, becoming a utility in 2010. [/b]
[size=12pt][font=andale mono][b]What's New?[/font][/size][b] ZodiacsReign was taking a new step toward the next generation of tools and ID list. I've taken a hiatus from doing more packs and utilities for now, I've been very busy. Mendorphins, another Moparscape member is now doing packs, so be sure to check his stuff out.[/b] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/21ejro.jpg[/img] [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/zodiacsreign][IMG]http://www.questionbin.com/design/images/blog/user/images/Cool%20download%20button.png[/img][/URL]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/22kw06.jpg[/img]
[size=23pt]Credits[/size] Z 0 D I A C/ZodiacsReign All that contributed
[center][size=18pt]Quotes[/size] [b]Lin[/b] : Nice job. Why don't you work on a server though? The packages out there aren't going to get any better than this to be honest.
[b]Galkon[/b] : Great job, I'll definitely use tools in this.
[b] Hidendra[/b] : DON'T WORRY THERE'S NO VIRUSES EVERYONE, SO DON'T ASK FOR TWO FUCKING VIRUS SCANS or i will kill you
[b]Cocoa[/b] : I already have this one on my computer, This is the best pack yet imo.
[center][i]ZodiacsReign 11.0 Utility was made by Z 0 D I A C of Moparscape/R-S Forums and Red Bar Pk of Emps-Scape & Released on October 24, 2010 & Re-Released on September 05, 2011

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

So long as you’re good with it… I don’t want to seem like I’m butting in your business.

Read full topic

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Z_0_D_I_A_C Z 0 D I A C
item.description:
@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:16, topic:413501”]Thanks for the mention in the post, this is the very thing that inspired me to do what I did. Although I’m re-writing the entire lists… very tedious task (especially the animations/gfx).

I think I’ll remain with old school though, not going to bother doing anything above 474. Fucking nice release, glad to see you’re still around.

For the record, a hacker would probably not know to mention me for doing packages also, so no need to spoil the first page with bloody “virus scans”.

All your virus scanners are crap, and so you should not jump straight away with a post, as some sort of “hero”, posting a “trojan” when you really don’t know the guy.

It spoils the topic and puts off potential downloads.

Plans for the future, Z?[/quote]

I don’t know yet, You continue to do more packs and improve on them, I don’t have the time anymore.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Thanks for the mention in the post, this is the very thing that inspired me to do what I did. Although I’m re-writing the entire lists… very tedious task (especially the animations/gfx).

I think I’ll remain with old school though, not going to bother doing anything above 474. Fucking nice release, glad to see you’re still around.

For the record, a hacker would probably not know to mention me for doing packages also, so no need to spoil the first page with bloody “virus scans”.

All your virus scanners are crap, and so you should not jump straight away with a post, as some sort of “hero”, posting a “trojan” when you really don’t know the guy.

It spoils the topic and puts off potential downloads.

Plans for the future, Z?

Read full topic

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Z_0_D_I_A_C Z 0 D I A C
item.description:
@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:13, topic:413501”][quote author=Z 0 D I A C link=topic=515002.msg3740210#msg3740210 date=1315270361]

Be quite, it’s because of an auto-restarter or of some sort, Z 0 D I A C is not a hacker nor sends out viruses of some sort.

Just being safe, especially considering the forums were hacked yesterday

EDIT: It was the Decompiler

Yeah, I hacked everyone yesterday, it was quite fun.
[/quote]

All passwords compromised, how do I know they didn’t copy & paste the old thread? I know it’s not a virus, I’m just saying, it’s a weird coincidence.[/quote]

I’ve been around Moparscape forums since 2007, don’t you think if I was a hacker I’d be banned by now?

Read full topic

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

JavaTC:

All passwords compromised, how do I know they didn’t copy & paste the old thread? I know it’s not a virus, I’m just saying, it’s a weird coincidence.

Z 0 D I A C has been releasing packets for a long time, he was never called a hacker once until it was some moron thinking he was a hacker in the past, let’s not bring those memories back and having to deal with it.

He’s not a hacker, period. And it wasn’t him that even did that, go to Moparisthebest website and look at the posts that Moparisthebest posted about the hacking.

Read full topic

item.title: ZodiacsReign Pack (Utility Edition) [Re-Release] 16,000 Downloads
item.dc:creator: @Z_0_D_I_A_C Z 0 D I A C
item.description:
@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[center]



ZodiacsReign was made to assist people who want to create a private server or to help people who need more help with their current server issues, the pack includes ID list’s, common tools and a few server sources. ZodiacsReign packs have been around since 2008, becoming a utility in 2010.

[size=12pt][font=andale mono][b]What’s New?[/font][/size]
ZodiacsReign was taking a new step toward the next generation of tools and ID list. I’ve taken a hiatus from doing more packs and utilities for now, I’ve been very busy. Mendorphins, another Moparscape member is now doing packs, so be sure to check his stuff out.

22kw06.jpg843×595

[size=23pt]Credits[/size]
Z 0 D I A C/ZodiacsReign
All that contributed

[center][size=18pt]Quotes[/size]
Lin : Nice job. Why don’t you work on a server though? The packages out there aren’t going to get any better than this to be honest.

Galkon : Great job, I’ll definitely use tools in this.

Hidendra : DON’T WORRY THERE’S NO VIRUSES EVERYONE, SO DON’T ASK FOR TWO FUCKING VIRUS SCANS or i will kill you

Cocoa : I already have this one on my computer, This is the best pack yet imo.

[center][i]ZodiacsReign 11.0 Utility was made by Z 0 D I A C of Moparscape/R-S Forums and Red Bar Pk of Emps-Scape & Released on October 24, 2010 & Re-Released on September 05, 2011
